TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IndentedTextWriter extends System.IO.TextWriter

summary.span: 提供可以使用定位點字串 (String) 語彙基元 (Token) 縮排新行的文字寫入器。

span.span: Provides a text writer that can indent new lines by a tab string token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擴充藉由提供插入定位點字串，並追蹤目前的縮排層級的方法。 extends a by providing methods that insert a tab string and track the current indentation level. 所以這個類別會使用 CodeDOM 程式碼產生器實作適用於產生程式碼，使用多個縮排層次格式化的文字。Text formatted with multiple indentation levels is useful for generated code, so this class is used by CodeDOM code generator implementations. 定位點字串為每個縮排所組成的字串。The tab string is the string that each indentation consists of. 通常的定位點字串包含泛空白字元。Typically the tab string contains white space. > [!NOTE] > 這個類別包含的連結要求和繼承要求套用到所有成員的類別層級。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A立即呼叫端或衍生的類別不具有完全信任權限時，會擲回。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)並[繼承要求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用寫入不同層級的縮排的文字。The following code example demonstrates using an to write text at different levels of indentation. [!code-cpp[IndentedTextWriterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IndentedTextWriterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IndentedTextWriterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

permission.span: 針對完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個類別不能由部分信任的程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.
for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 這個類別無法繼承由部分信任的程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定縮排層級。The following code example demonstrates setting the indentation level of an . 縮排層級是為具有每一行的前置詞的索引標籤字串數目。The indentation level is the number of tab strings to prefix each line with. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何撰寫任何程式，而不需要 索引標籤字串縮排。The following code example demonstrates writing a line without tab string indentations.
